subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The sideline, and the end line, is the domain of football’s acrobats, its tightrope walkers and contortionists, where the fundamental art of catching a pass becomes a balance-beam routine.
snippet: The sideline, and the end line, is the domain of football’s acrobats, its tightrope walkers and contortionists, where the fundamental art of catching a pass becomes a balance-beam routine.
